wallet.keysDescription: Keys are needed to open boxes. You can get them for tasks or bets.
wallet.bonusesDescription: Bonuses are needed to improve your chibi. You can get them during farming.
wallet.raceDescription: Race is a main currency in the game. You can get it for bets or tasks.

game.subheader: In Radar game you can get more boxes!
game.description: In the Radar game you can find many useful and interesting things that will help you improve your chibi and find even more boxes

case.header: Open Red box and get RACE coins
case.description: Get the keys for guessing the winner of the battles

friens.call: Invite your friends and get bonuses
